SEARCH
Package org.opensearch.sdk.api

Interface ActionExtension

All Known Subinterfaces:
SystemIndexExtension
All Known Implementing Classes:
HelloWorldExtension, TestSDKActionModule.TestActionExtension
public interface ActionExtension
An additional extension point for Extensions that extends OpenSearch's scripting functionality. Implement it like this: 

   {@literal @}Override
   public List<ActionHandler<?, ?>> getActions() {
       return Arrays.asList(new ActionHandler<>(ReindexAction.INSTANCE, TransportReindexAction.class),
               new ActionHandler<>(UpdateByQueryAction.INSTANCE, TransportUpdateByQueryAction.class),
               new ActionHandler<>(DeleteByQueryAction.INSTANCE, TransportDeleteByQueryAction.class),
               new ActionHandler<>(RethrottleAction.INSTANCE, TransportRethrottleAction.class));
   }

    • getActions

      default List<ActionExtension.ActionHandler<? extends org.opensearch.action.ActionRequest,? extends org.opensearch.action.ActionResponse>> getActions()
      Actions added by this extension.
      Returns:
      a list of ActionHandler instances representing the added actions.

    • getClientActions

      default List<org.opensearch.action.ActionType<? extends org.opensearch.action.ActionResponse>> getClientActions()
      Client actions added by this extension. This defaults to all of the ActionType in getActions().
      Returns:
      a list of ActionType instances representing the added client actions.

    • getExtensionRestHandlers

      default List<ExtensionRestHandler> getExtensionRestHandlers()
      Gets a list of ExtensionRestHandler implementations this extension handles.
      Returns:
      a list of REST handlers (REST actions) this extension handles.

    • getRestHeaders

      default Collection<org.opensearch.rest.RestHeaderDefinition> getRestHeaders()
      Returns headers which should be copied through rest requests on to internal requests.
      Returns:
      a collection of RestHeaderDefinition instances representing the headers to be copied.

    • getTaskHeaders

      default Collection<String> getTaskHeaders()
      Returns headers which should be copied from internal requests into tasks.
      Returns:
      a collection of String instances representing the headers to be copied.

    • getRestHandlerWrapper

      default UnaryOperator<ExtensionRestHandler> getRestHandlerWrapper(org.opensearch.common.util.concurrent.ThreadContext threadContext)
      Returns a function used to wrap each rest request before handling the request. The returned UnaryOperator is called for every incoming rest request and receives the original rest handler as it's input. This allows adding arbitrary functionality around rest request handlers to do for instance logging or authentication. A simple example of how to only allow GET request is here: 
       
    UnaryOperator<ExtensionRestHandler> getRestHandlerWrapper(ThreadContext threadContext) {
      return originalHandler -> (RestHandler) (request) -> {
        if (request.method() != Method.GET) {
          throw new IllegalStateException("only GET requests are allowed");
        }
        originalHandler.handleRequest(request);
      };
    }
      Parameters:
      threadContext - The Thread Context which can be used by the operator
      Returns:
      a function used to wrap each rest request

    • mappingRequestValidators

      default Collection<org.opensearch.action.RequestValidators.RequestValidator<org.opensearch.action.admin.indices.mapping.put.PutMappingRequest>> mappingRequestValidators()
      Returns a collection of validators that are used by RequestValidators to validate a PutMappingRequest before the executing it.

    • indicesAliasesRequestValidators

      default Collection<org.opensearch.action.RequestValidators.RequestValidator<org.opensearch.action.admin.indices.alias.IndicesAliasesRequest>> indicesAliasesRequestValidators()
